braceletoflight@siegfried.name: BraceletOfLight
braceletoflight@siegfried.examine:
This bracelet with a pur white material. It's an object that you
should keep preciously.

wardrobeoflight@siegfried.name: WardrobeOfLight
wardrobeoflight@siegfried.examine: This holy wardrobe contains very powerful items.
wardrobeoflight@siegfried.desc[2]:
In one corner of the room, there's the &+BWardrobe &+Wof
&+YLight&*. It's locked.

armoroflight@siegfried.desc[1]:
The majestic &+BArmor &+Wof &+YLight&* is standing here on its
stand.
armoroflight@siegfried.name: ArmorOfLight
armoroflight@siegfried.examine:
This armor seems to be made of the same matter as the Sword of
Light. This armor can really help you in your quest.

chestoflight@siegfried.name: ChestOfLight
chestoflight@siegfried.examine:
This chest belongs to Siegfried and contains some pure energy items.
Handle with care.

bootsoflight@siegfried.desc[1]:
The magnificient &+BBoots &+Wof &+YLight&* rest here on their
stand.
bootsoflight@siegfried.name: BootsOfLight
bootsoflight@siegfried.examine: Only the immortal people can wear these magnificient boots.

ringoflight@siegfried.name: RingOfLight
ringoflight@siegfried.examine:
This ring is made of pure white material that only Simon knows
how to manipulate. It's a very valuable item.

swordoflight@siegfried.name: SwordOfLight
swordoflight@siegfried.examine:
This sword is as light as air.  It is very powerful, only a few
may wield this deadly weapon.

helmetoflight@siegfried.desc[1]:
The beautiful &+BHelmet &+Wof &+YLight&* is standing here on its
stand.
helmetoflight@siegfried.name: HelmetOfLight
helmetoflight@siegfried.examine: This beautiful helmet can only be worn by those who can get it.

robeoflight@siegfried.name: RobeOfLight
robeoflight@siegfried.examine:
This &+BRobe &+Wof &+YLight&* is made of a pure material. It's
very powerful.

siegfried2@siegfried.title: &+cSiegfried's Living Room
siegfried2@siegfried.description:
The beach leave the place to another place. All here is calm. It's
dark here but a fire in a fireplace provide a bit of light. The walls are
grey and there's grey moquette. All you feel is to relax and sleep on the
comforty couch just in front of the fire.

siegfried1@siegfried.title: &+cSiegfried's Beach
siegfried1@siegfried.description:
You don't understand why but the panorama slowly changes from the
building to a beautiful golden sand beach. It's a sunny day and the sun is
really hot. You hear the waves pounding on the sand. This splendid place
gives you just the taste of lying on a soft towel to sleep on the sand.

Not far off the coast you see a shimmering light coming from the sea. As
you approach from the source of the light, you discover that's a sword.

didier@siegfried.name: Didier
didier@siegfried.examine:
Didier is extremely weakly built but is in excellent condition
though. He looks like a big dumb fag.
didier@siegfried.description:
Didier, Siegfried's brother, is lying here on a towel and taking
a tan.
